content: times scinc 6 single_crochet sl into first stitch 78 single_crochet 14 ch1 12 single_crochet scinc 6 times sl into first stitch 84 single_crochet fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing weave in ends purse handle for the purse handle i held one strand of red yarn and one strand of beige yarn together and used a 5mm hook to crochet around a length of strong flat ribbon i used curling ribbon this is to prevent stretching please feel free to adjust the length of the purse handle to suit your style simply start with a longer or shorter chain copyright grace akatsu 2023 graceakatsu@gmail com 1 chain 150 this should be slightly shorter than the length of your ribbon 2 skip first chain from hook 149 single_crochet working around the ribbon and encasing it in each stitch 149 single_crochet fasten_off trim the ribbon so that it is not sticking out of the ends of the single_crochet row use a dab of super glue to attach the two ribbon ends together and let dry sew the ends of the single_crochet row together assemble the purse by sewing the front and back onto the purse handle see photo at beginning of pattern for reference weave in ends and enjoy copyright grace akatsu 2023 graceakatsu@gmail com
